scripts.test:desktop:chrome:wip: SHOW=true ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run --tests --debug -c codecept.conf.ts --grep '(?=.*@wip)(?=.*@desktop)' --profile 'browser:chromium|emulate:Desktop Chrome'
scripts.test:desktop:chrome: SHOW=true ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run --tests --steps -c codecept.conf.ts --grep '(?=.*@desktop)' --profile 'browser:chromium|emulate:Desktop Chrome'
scripts.test:desktop:safari: SHOW=false ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run --tests -c codecept.conf.ts --grep '(?=.*@desktop)' --profile 'browser:webkit|emulate:Desktop Safari'
scripts.test:desktop:chrome:workers: ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run-workers 2 -c codecept.conf.ts --grep '(?=.*@desktop)' --profile 'browser:chromium|emulate:Desktop Chrome'
scripts.test:a11y: SHOW=true ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run --tests --steps -c codecept.a11y.conf.ts --profile 'browser:chromium|emulate:Desktop Chrome'
scripts.test:a11y:CI: ENV=PROD npx codeceptjs run --tests --steps -c codecept.a11y.conf.ts --profile 'browser:chromium|emulate:Desktop Chrome'
